<!-- R -->

```{r setup-libraries}
library(papaja)
library(tidyverse)
library(rio)
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)
library(emmeans)
library(afex)

r_refs("./markdown/r-references.bib")

r_citations <- cite_r(
  file = "./markdown/r-references.bib",
  pkgs = c("papaja", "tidyverse", "knitr", "rmarkdown", "emmeans", "afex"),
  omit = FALSE,
  footnote = TRUE
  )

```

```{r setup-print-percent}
print_percent <- function(freq){
  percent = freq*100
  apa_msg = papaja::apa_num(percent)
  final = paste(apa_msg, "%")
  return(final)
}
```
